column1: tatar_union_diplo_title;Reestablish the Kipchak Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x

tatar_union_diplo_desc;The Tatar States are weak and fragmented. For far to long we have underestimated the Russians and the fall of the Kazan Khanate proved this. The realization of this threat and the shifting balance of power has convinced our great Khan to reconsile with his old tatar rivals. All the Khans have agreed to reestablish the Altin Urda under our banner! Moscow will burn!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
tatar_union_mil_title;Reestablish the Kipchak Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x

tatar_union_mil_desc;The Tatar States were weak and fragmented. For far to long we have underestimated the Russians and the fall of the Kazan Khanate proved this. We need to overthrow our old rivals and reassert our dominance over the Russians once again. Âšerge Han!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
tatar_formation_title;Reestablish the Kipchak Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
tatar_formation_desc;The Tatar States were weak and fragmented. After decades of struggle and decline we managed to subdue the Tatar Steppes
column2: now it is time to reclaim Batu Khans legacy.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: end_kazan_title;End the Kazan Raids;;;;;;;;;;;;x
end_kazan_desc;For centuries the raids originating from Kazan have devasteded. It is time to finally bring an end to the Tatar Joke!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
control_novgorod_title;Take control in Novgorod;;;;;;;;;;;;x
control_novgorod_desc;The Republic of Novgorod has been a part of our sphere of influence for centuries
column2: but with increasing russian nationalism we should integrate them further into our realm.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_estonia_title;Integrate Estonia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_estonia_desc;Estonia has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the estonian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_livonia_title;Integrate Livonia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_livonia_desc;Livonia has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the livonian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: integrate_ingermanland_title;Integrate Ingria;;;;;;;;;;;;x
integrate_ingermanland_desc;Ingria has been a dominion of Sweden since the 16th century
column2: but with the increasing threat of russian unification our control of the Northern Baltics is in danger. We should sacrifice the ingrian autonomy to secure the regions stability!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_nogay_rej_title;Subjugate the Nogay Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_nogay_rej_desc;The foolish Khan of Nogay has refused our offer. We need to subjugate him by the sword to save the Tatars from russian expansionism!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_nogay_acc_title;Nogay accepts our offer;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_nogay_acc_desc;The Khan of Nogay has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralize_the_khanate_title;Centralize the Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
centralize_the_khanate_desc;Now that the russian threat has been dealt with our rule is unchallenged. It is time to formally unite the Khanate!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_rej_title;Subjugate the Qashliq Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_rej_desc;The foolish Khan of Qashliq has refused our offer. We need to subjugate him by the sword to save the Tatars from russian expansionism!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_acc_title;Qashliq accepts our offer;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_sib_acc_desc;The Khan of Qashliq has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_akh_acc_title;Astrakhan accepts our offer;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_akh_acc_desc;The Khan of Astrakhan has accepted our offer. The Russians wont stand a chance against a united Steppe!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
avenge_kazan_title;Avenge Kazan!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
avenge_kazan_desc;The russian conquest of Kazan was extremely brutal. It depopulated the once rich region of the Upper Idel
column2: thousends of Kazanis fleed their home and even more got killed by Skobelevs troops
column3: not to mention the ruthless execution of the Khan and it's entire family. It is our duty
column4: now that the Steppe stands united

column1: subdue_yugra_title;Subdue Yugra;;;;;;;;;;;;x

subdue_yugra_desc;The fur traders of the yugrian wastes were able to remain independant by opportunistically switching alliances with the Tatars and Russians. Now that we are dominating both Russia and the Steppe we are in a position to assume direcet control over their valueable ressources.;;;;;;;;;;;;x
subdue_the_sayan_uriankhai_title;Subdue the Sayan Tribes;;;;;;;;;;;;x
subdue_the_sayan_uriankhai_desc;After having conquered Yugra
column2: the cold wastes of Siberia are almost free to grab. The only thing holding us back is the influencial position of the Oirat Khagnate in Tuva and the Baikal. The conquest of the Sayan Tribes will increase our influence in the region.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: annex_altai_uriankhai_title;Annex Tuva;;;;;;;;;;;;x
annex_altai_uriankhai_desc;Our increased influence in Tuva allows us to further integrate the region
column2: this act however will force the Oirats to act.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: vassalize_buryatia_title;Take control over Buryatia;;;;;;;;;;;;x
vassalize_buryatia_desc;The Oirat control in Central Siberia has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_daurs_title;Take control in the Daur Khanate;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_daurs_desc;The Oirat control in the North has collapsed
column2: we need to fill this vacuum of power.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_manchu_title;The Jurchen Conflict;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_manchu_desc;The momentum of the Pacific Push still hasn't slowed down. A lot of Tatar tribes still search for their own
column3: suitable plot of land. Many of these tribes now violated the territory of the Jurchen
column4: a tributary of the Great Shun. This needs to be settled so that further conflict can be avoided.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: further_siberian_expansion_title;Subdue the Sakhalar;;;;;;;;;;;;x
further_siberian_expansion_desc;The semi-nomadic sakhalar originally fleed from the mongols in the 13th century. They now live in the rich basins of the Lena
column2: Aldan and Vilyuy Rivers and are fabled as horse breeders. But now they pose the last obstacle in our Push to the Pacific
column3: their subjugating would not only give us access to their skills
column4: but also their rich fur market.;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: the_pacific_title;The Pacific Coast;;;;;;;;;;;;x
the_pacific_desc;Our troops have finally reached the long awaited coastline
column2: but our forces meet resistance from the local population. Even though our troops were successfull
column3: the areas of Kamchatka and Chukchia are now almost uninhabitated. Nevertheless
column4: we should formally announce the annexetion of these territory!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: conquest_of_the_north_title;The Conquest of the North;;;;;;;;;;;;x
conquest_of_the_north_desc;The land of the Tymyr was thought to be only a part of Siberlar folklore
column2: but with our conquest multiple multiple reports have told us about a group of people far in the north speaking a familiar sounding language. We should use this to justify the conquest of these regions!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_the_northern_caucasus_title;Claim the Northern Caucasus;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_the_northern_caucasus_desc;While the Northwestern Caucasus has been under our control for centuries the Northeast has been part of the Timurid Empire
column2: but the recent collapse of the iranian behemoth left the entire Caucasus in turmoil. Local Khanates
column3: Tribes and Christian Kingdoms is all what is left. This is a perfect opportunity to not only establish a amazing natural border
column4: but also to integrate the turkic tribes living in these regions!;;;;;;;;;;;;x

column1: claim_qasim_title;Claim Qasim;;;;;;;;;;;;x
claim_qasim_desc;The Tatars of Qasim originated from the lands of the Golden Horde
column2: but during their collapse thousends of Tatars fleed. The Hetmans of Ryazan and Kursk offered them refugee. In exchange they were ordered to protect the border regions and during time most of them even converted to Christianity. Now that the Khanate is united once again we should reincorporate our lost brethern!;;;;;;;;;;;;x
